java/liquibase/database/structure/Table.java

00001 package liquibase.database.structure;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 
00005 import java.util.ArrayList;
00006 import java.util.List;
00007 
00008 public class Table implements DatabaseObject, Comparable<Table> {
00009 
00010     private Database database;
00011     private String name;
00012     private String remarks;
00013     private List<Column> columns = new ArrayList<Column>();
00014 
00015     public Table(String name) {
00016         this.name = name;
00017     }
00018 
00019     public String getName() {
00020         return name;
00021     }
00022 
00023     public Database getDatabase() {
00024         return database;
00025     }
00026 
00027     public void setDatabase(Database database) {
00028         this.database = database;
00029     }
00030 
00031     public String getRemarks() {
00032         return remarks;
00033     }
00034 
00035     public void setRemarks(String remarks) {
00036         this.remarks = remarks;
00037     }
00038 
00039     public List<Column> getColumns() {
00040         return columns;
00041     }
00042 
00043 
00044     public boolean equals(Object o) {
00045         if (this == o) return true;
00046         if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
00047 
00048         Table that = (Table) o;
00049 
00050         return name.equalsIgnoreCase(that.name);
00051 
00052     }
00053 
00054     public int hashCode() {
00055         return name.toUpperCase().hashCode();
00056     }
00057 
00058 
00059     public int compareTo(Table o) {
00060         return this.getName().compareToIgnoreCase(o.getName());
00061     }
00062 
00063 
00064     public String toString() {
00065         String tableStr = getName()+" (";
00066         for (int i=0;i<columns.size();i++) {
00067                 if (i>0) {
00068                         tableStr += ","+columns.get(i).getName();
00069                 } else {
00070                         tableStr += columns.get(i).getName();
00071                 }
00072         }
00073         tableStr += ")";
00074         return tableStr;
00075     }
00076 
00081     public Column getColumn(String columnName) {
00082         for (Column column : getColumns()) {
00083             if (column.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(columnName)) {
00084                 return column;
00085             }
00086         }
00087         return null;
00088     }
00089 }
